mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT ci.file_name FROM court_image ci WHERE ci.court_idx = c.court_idx ORDER BY ci.photo_idx ASC LIMIT 1) AS firstImageName , c.court_name AS courtName ,c.court_address AS courtAddress ,c.court_info AS courtInfo ,c.court_price AS courtPrice ,c.court_state AS courtState ,c.court_official AS courtOfficial ,c.court_idx AS courtIdx ,(SELECT COUNT(j.court_idx) from jjim j where j.court_idx = c.court_idx and j.id = 'admin') AS jjim ,c.court_idx FROM court c WHERE c.court_state = 'true' AND c.court_official = 'false' ORDER BY c.court_address
